categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Stephen Costantino is an actor who portrayed one of Jabba's Gamorrean Guards. His character meets his demise at the hands of Luke Skywalker aboard a barge in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. He is good friends with fellow cast mate Corey Dee Williams, and the two formed a band together.
